00096     public static function createEx( $arModel, $arOptions = array() )
00097     {
00098         //  Initialize...
00099         $_sFormHeader = $_sOut = $_sPager = null;
00100         self::$m_iColumnCount = 0;
00101         self::$m_arGridOptions = $arOptions;
00102         
00103         //  Register our css...
00104         PS::_rcf( PS::_publish( Yii::getPathOfAlias( 'pogostick.templates.css' ) . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . 'ps-data-grid.css' ) );
00105         
00106         //  Store our model, get our options
00107         self::$m_arGridOptions['data'] = $arModel;
00108         $_arPagerOptions = PS::o( $arOptions, 'pagerOptions', array(), true );
00109         $_sPagerClass = PS::o( $arOptions, 'pagerClass', 'CPSLinkPager', true );
00110         $_bAccordion = PS::o( $arOptions, 'accordion', false, true );
00111         $_sGridHeader = PS::o( $arOptions, 'gridHeader', null, true );
00112         $_oPages = PS::o( $arOptions, 'pages', null, true );
00113         $_arFormHeader = PS::o( $arOptions, 'formHeader', null, true );
00114         $_sItemName = PS::o( $arOptions, 'itemName', 'itme' );
00115         
00116         if ( null !== $_arFormHeader )
00117         {
00118             $_arFormHeader['flashMessage'] = PS::o( $arOptions, 'flashMessage' );
00119             $_arFormHeader['itemName'] = PS::o( $_arFormHeader, 'itemName', $_sItemName );
00120             $_sFormHeader = PS::o( $_arFormHeader, 'title', 'Form Header', true );
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124             if ( null !== ( $_arMenuButtons = PS::o( $arOptions, 'menuButtons', null, true ) ) )
00125             {
00126                 $_sFormHeader = PS::o( $_arFormHeader, 'title', 'Form Header', true );
00127                 $_arFormHeader = array(
00128                     'menuButtons' => $_arMenuButtons,
00129                     'itemName' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'dataItemName', $_sItemName ),
00130                 );
00131             }
00132         }
00133         
00134         //  Make a form header!
00135         if ( $_arFormHeader ) echo CPSForm::formHeaderEx( $_sFormHeader, $_arFormHeader );
00136         
00137         //  Only work with CPSLinkPagers
00138         if ( ! is_a( $_sPagerClass, 'CPSLinkPager' ) ) $_sPagerClass = 'CPSLinkPager';
00139 
00140         $_iPagerLocation = PS::o( $_arPagerOptions, 'location', PS::PL_TOP_RIGHT, true );
00141 
00142         //  Create widget...
00143         if ( $_oPages ) 
00144         {
00145             $_oWidget = Yii::app()->controller->createWidget( $_sPagerClass, array_merge( array( 'pages' => $_oPages ), $_arPagerOptions ) );
00146         
00147             if ( $_oWidget ) 
00148             {
00149                 $_oWidget->pagerLocation = PS::nvl( $_iPagerLocation, $_oWidget->pagerLocation );
00150                 $_sPager = $_oWidget->run( true );
00151 
00152                 //  Where do you want it?
00153                 if ( $_oWidget->pagerLocation == PS::PL_TOP_LEFT || $_oWidget->pagerLocation == PS::PL_TOP_RIGHT ) $_sOut .= $_sPager;
00154             }
00155         }
00156 
00157         //  Add accordion header if requested...
00158         if ( $_bAccordion ) echo '<h3 class="ui-accordion-header ui-helper-reset ui-state-active ui-corner-top ps-grid-accordion-header"><span class="ui-icon ui-icon-triangle-1-s" ></span><a href="#"><strong>' . $_sGridHeader . '</strong></a></h3>';
00159         
00160         //  Build our grid
00161         $_sOut .= self::beginDataGrid();
00162         $_sOut .= self::getDataGridRows();
00163         $_sOut .= self::endDataGrid();
00164 
00165         //  Display on the bottom...
00166         if ( $_oWidget && ( $_oWidget->pagerLocation == PS::PL_BOTTOM_LEFT || $_oWidget->pagerLocation == PS::PL_BOTTOM_RIGHT ) ) 
00167             $_sOut .= $_sPager;
00168         
00169         return $_sOut;
00170     }

00176     protected static function beginDataGrid()
00177     {
00178         $oSort = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'sort', null );
00179         $arColumns = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'columns', array() );
00180         $arModel = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'data', null );
00181         $_arActions = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'actions', array() );
00182         $bAddActions = ! empty( $_arActions );
00183         $_sGridId = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'id', null, true );
00184         $_sGridClass = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'gridClass', 'ps-data-grid ui-widget-content', true );
00185         
00186         $_sHeaders = null;
00187         $_oModel = is_array( $arModel ) && count( $arModel ) ? current( $arModel ) : null;
00188 
00189         if ( ! $_oModel && null != ( $_sModelName = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'modelName' ) ) )
00190             $_oModel = new $_sModelName();
00191 
00192         foreach ( $arColumns as $_sKey => $_oColumn )
00193         {
00194             $_sColumn = CPSTransform::cleanColumn( ( is_array( $_oColumn ) ? $_sKey = array_shift( $_oColumn ) : $_oColumn ) );
00195             if ( $_oModel ) $_sModelLabel = $_oModel->getAttributeLabel( $_sColumn );
00196             $_sLabel = PS::o( $_oColumn, 'label', ( $oSort ) ? self::appendSortArrow( $oSort->link( $_sColumn ) ) : ( $_sModelLabel ? $_sModelLabel : $_sColumn ), true );
00197             $_sHeaders .= PS::tag( 'th', array(), $_sLabel );
00198             self::$m_iColumnCount++;
00199         }   
00200 
00201         if ( $bAddActions ) 
00202         {
00203             $_sHeaders .= PS::tag( 'th', array( 'class' => 'ps-actions-header' ), 'Actions' );
00204             self::$m_iColumnCount++;
00205         }
00206             
00207         //  Begin our grid
00208         $_arTableOpts = array(
00209             'class' => $_sGridClass,
00210         );
00211         
00212         if ( $_sGridId ) $_arTableOpts['id'] = $_sGridId;
00213         
00214         return PS::tag( 'table', $_arTableOpts, PS::tag( 'tr', array( 'class' => 'ui-widget-header' ), $_sHeaders ), false );
00215     }

00217     /***
00218     * Builds all data rows for a grid
00219     * If a column name is prefixed with an '@', it will be stripped and the column will be a link to the 'update' view
00220     * If a column name is prefixed with an '?', it will be stripped and the column will be treated as a boolean
00221     * 
00222     * @return string
00223     */
00224     protected static function getDataGridRows()
00225     {
00226         //  Pull are variables from the options
00227         $_sNoDataMessage = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'noDataMessage', 'No Records Found', true );
00228         $arModel = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'data', array() );
00229         $sLinkView = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'linkView', null );
00230         $arColumns = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'columns', array() );
00231         $sPK = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'pk', null );
00232         $bEncode = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'encode', true );
00233         $arDivComment = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'divComment', array() );
00234         $_sRowIdTemplate = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'rowIdTemplate', '_grid_row_{pk}' );
00235         
00236         //  sub options
00237         $_arOptions = PS::o( $arActions, 'options', array(), true );
00238         $_sLockColumn = PS::o( $_arOptions, 'lockColumn', null, true );
00239         
00240         //  Build the grid rows
00241         $_sOut = null;
00242         $_iRow = 0;
00243         
00244         //  Build the output row
00245         $_arRowOpts = array();
00246         
00247         if ( count( $arDivComment ) && $_oModel->hasErrors() )
00248             $_arRowOpts = array( 'class' => $arDivComment[1], 'title' => implode( ', ', current( $_oModel->getErrors() ) ) );
00249             
00250         $_arRowOpts['class'] = PS::o( $_arRowOpts, 'class', 'ui-widget-content' );
00251         
00252         if ( ! $arModel || ( is_array( $arModel ) && ! count( $arModel ) ) ) 
00253         {
00254             $_sOut .= PS::tag( 'tr', $_arRowOpts, PS::tag( 'td', array( 'class' => 'ps-data-grid-no-data-found', 'colspan' => self::$m_iColumnCount ), $_sNoDataMessage ) );
00255         }
00256         else
00257         {
00258             $_sBaseClass = $_arOptions['class'];
00259             
00260             foreach ( $arModel as $_iIndex => $_oModel )
00261             {
00262                 $_sActions = null;
00263                 $_sPK = PS::nvl( $sPK, $_oModel->getTableSchema()->primaryKey );
00264                 $_sTD = CPSTransform::column( $_oModel, $arColumns, $sLinkView, 'td', array( 'encode' => $bEncode ) );
00265                     
00266                 //  Build actions...
00267                 if ( $_sActions = self::buildActions( $_oModel ) )
00268                     $_sTD .= PS::tag( 'td', array( 'class' => 'ps-grid-actions' ), '<div class="ps-grid-actions-inner">' . $_sActions . '<hr /></div>' );
00269                 
00270                 //  Row id template? Fill it in
00271                 if ( $_sRowIdTemplate ) 
00272                 {
00273                     if ( false !== stripos( $_sRowIdTemplate, '{#}' ) )
00274                         $_arRowOpts['id'] = str_ireplace( '{#}', $_iRow, $_sRowIdTemplate );
00275                     else if ( false !== stripos( $_sRowIdTemplate, '{pk}' ) && $_sPK )
00276                         $_arRowOpts['id'] = str_ireplace( '{pk}', $_oModel->{$_sPK}, $_sRowIdTemplate );
00277                 }
00278                 
00279                 //  Mark odd rows
00280                 $_sClass = $_sBaseClass;
00281                 
00282                 if ( $_iRow % 2 == 0 ) 
00283                 {
00284                     $_sClass .= ' ui-state-default ps-data-grid-row-odd';
00285                 }
00286                 else
00287                 {
00288                     $_sClass .= ' ui-state-active ps-data-grid-row-even';
00289                 }
00290                 
00291                 $_arOptions['class'] = $_sClass;
00292                 
00293                 $_sOut .= PS::tag( 'tr', $_arOptions, $_sTD );
00294                 
00295                 //  Add subrows...
00296                 if ( ! empty( $_oModel->subRows ) )
00297                 {
00298                     foreach ( $_oModel->subRows as $_oRow )
00299                     {
00300                         $_arInnerOptions = PS::smart_array_merge( PS::o( $_oRow, '_innerHtmlOptions', array(), true ), array( 'encode' => false ) );
00301                         $_arOuterOptions = PS::smart_array_merge( array( 'class' => 'ps-sub-row' ), PS::o( $_oRow, '_outerHtmlOptions', array(), true ) );
00302                         
00303                         $_sRow = CPSTransform::column( $_oRow, array_keys( $_oRow ), null, 'td', $_arInnerOptions );
00304 
00305                         if ( ! empty( $arActions ) )
00306                         {
00307                             $_sRow .= PS::tag( 'td', PS::smart_array_merge( $_arInnerOptions, array( 'class' => 'grid-actions' ) ), '<div class="_grid_actions">&nbsp;<hr /></div>' );
00308                         }
00309                             
00310                         $_sOut .= PS::tag( 'tr', $_arOuterOptions, $_sRow );
00311                     }
00312                 }
00313                 
00314                 $_iRow++;
00315             }
00316         }
00317         
00318         return $_sOut;
00319     }

00326     {

00335     protected static function appendSortArrow( $sLink )
00336     {
00337         return $sLink;
00338         
00339         $_iPosNext = stripos( $sLink, '-' );
00340         $_iPos = stripos( $sLink, '.desc' );
00341         
00342         if ( $_iPos !== false && $_iPos < $_iPosNext ) 
00343         {
00344             $_sDir = 's';
00345             $_sTitle = 'Sorted Ascending';
00346         }
00347         else
00348         {
00349             $_sTitle = 'Sorted Descending';
00350             $_sDir = 'n';
00351         }           
00352 
00353         return $sLink . PS::tag( 'span', array( 'title' => $_sTitle, 'class' => "ui-icon ui-icon-arrowthickstop-1-{$_sDir} ps-data-grid-sort-arrow"  ) );
00354     }

00365     protected static function buildActions( CPSModel $oModel )
00366     {
00367         $_oId = $_sActions = $_eAction = null;
00368         $_sDataName = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'dataItemName', 'item' );
00369 
00370         //  Fix up link view array...
00371         $_sLinkView = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'linkView', null );
00372         $_sViewName = PS::nvl( $_sLinkView, 'update' );
00373             
00374         $_sPK = PS::nvl( PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'pk' ), $oModel->getTableSchema()->primaryKey );
00375         $_arActions = PS::o( self::$m_arGridOptions, 'actions', array( 'edit', 'delete' ) );
00376         
00377         //  sub options
00378         $_arOptions = PS::o( $_arActions, 'options', array(), true );
00379         $_sLockColumn = PS::o( $_arOptions, 'lockColumn', null, true );
00380 
00381         //  Build the actions
00382         foreach ( $_arActions as $_sKey => $_oParts )
00383         {
00384             $_eAction = PS::ACTION_NONE;
00385             $_sAction = ( is_numeric( $_oParts ) && $_oParts <= PS::ACTION_GENERIC ) ? self::$m_arActionMap[ $_oParts ] : $_oParts;
00386             $_arActionOptions = null;
00387             $_arLink = is_array( $_sViewName ) ? $_sViewName : array( $_sViewName );
00388 
00389             //  If action is an array, first element is action, second is viewName (which can also be an array)
00390             if ( is_array( $_oParts ) )
00391             {
00392                 if ( isset( $_oParts[1] ) )
00393                 {
00394                     $_sViewName = $_oParts[1];
00395                     $_arLink = is_array( $_sViewName ) ? $_sViewName : array( $_sViewName );
00396                     $_sAction = array_shift( $_oParts );
00397                     unset( $_oParts[1] );
00398                 }
00399                 else
00400                 {
00401                     //  The rest art action options...
00402                     $_arActionOptions = $_oParts;
00403                     $_arLink = PS::nvl( PS::o( $_arActionOptions, 'url' ), $_arLink );
00404                     if ( ! is_array( $_arLink ) ) $_arLink = array( $_arLink );
00405                 }
00406             }
00407 
00408             //  Invalid action? Skip
00409             if ( is_numeric( $_sAction ) )
00410                 $_eAction = intval( $_sAction );
00411             else if ( is_array( $_sAction ) && is_numeric( $_sKey ) )
00412                 $_eAction = intval( $_sKey );
00413             else if ( false === ( $_eAction = array_search( $_sAction, self::$m_arActionMap, true ) ) )
00414                 continue;
00415             
00416             //  Skip lock actions on non-lockable columns
00417             if ( ! $_sLockColumn and ( $_eAction == PS::ACTION_LOCK || $_eAction == PS::ACTION_UNLOCK ) )
00418                 continue;
00419                 
00420             //  Stuff in the PK(s)
00421             $_arLink[ $_sPK ] = $_oId = $oModel->{$_sPK};
00422             foreach ( $_arLink as $_sKey => $_sValue )
00423             {
00424                 if ( 0 != preg_match( '/\%\%(.*)+\%\%/i', $_arLink[$_sKey], $_arMatch ) )
00425                 {
00426                     if ( $_arMatch )
00427                     {
00428                         foreach ( array_keys( $oModel->getAttributes() ) as $_sAttribute )
00429                         {
00430                             $_arLink[ $_sKey ] = str_ireplace( "%%{$_sAttribute}%%", $oModel->{$_sAttribute}, $_arLink[ $_sKey ] );
00431                         }
00432                     }
00433                 }
00434             }
00435 
00436             //  Add the action
00437             switch ( $_eAction )
00438             {
00442                 case PS::ACTION_GENERIC:
00443                     $_sLabel = PS::o( $_arActionOptions, 'label' );
00444                     $_sIconName = PS::o( $_arActionOptions, 'icon' );
00445                     $_sConfirm = PS::o( $_arActionOptions, 'confirm' );
00446 
00447                     //  Build an action
00448                     $_sActions .= PS::jquiButton( $_sLabel, $_arLink,
00449                         array(
00450                             'confirm' => $_sConfirm,
00451                             'iconOnly' => true, 
00452                             'icon' => $_sIconName,
00453                             'iconSize' => 'small'
00454                         )
00455                     );
00456                     break;
00457                     
00458                 case PS::ACTION_LOCK:           //  Special case if model contains lock column
00459                     $_sLockName = ( ! $oModel->{$_sLockColumn} ) ? 'Lock' : 'Unlock';
00460                     $_sIconName = ( $oModel->{$_sLockColumn} ) ? 'locked' : 'unlocked';
00461 
00462                     //  Lock import file
00463                     $_sActions .= PS::jquiButton( $_sLockName, $_arLink,
00464                         array(
00465                             'confirm' => "Do you really want to " . strtolower( $_sLockName ) . " this {$_sDataName}?",
00466                             'iconOnly' => true, 
00467                             'icon' => $_sIconName,
00468                             'iconSize' => 'small'
00469                         )
00470                     );
00471                     break;
00472                 
00473                 case PS::ACTION_VIEW:
00474                     $_sActions .= PS::jquiButton( 'View', $_arLink, array( 'iconOnly' => true, 'icon' => 'gear', 'iconSize' => 'small' ) );
00475                     break;
00476                     
00477                 case PS::ACTION_EDIT:
00478                     $_sActions .= PS::jquiButton( 'Edit', $_arLink, array( 'iconOnly' => true, 'icon' => 'pencil', 'iconSize' => 'small' ) );
00479                     break;
00480                     
00481                 case PS::ACTION_DELETE:
00482                     $_sActions .= PS::jquiButton( 'Delete', array( 'delete', $_sPK => $_oId ),
00483                         array(
00484                             'confirm' => "Do you really want to delete this {$_sDataName}?",
00485                             'iconOnly' => true, 
00486                             'icon' => 'trash', 
00487                             'iconSize' => 'small'
00488                         )
00489                     );
00490                     break;
00491                     
00492                 default:    //  Catchall for prefab stuff...
00493                     $_sActions .= str_ireplace( '%%PK_VALUE%%', $_oId, $_sAction );
00494                     break;
00495             }
00496         }
00497         
00498         return $_sActions;
00499     }

00519     public static function create( $sDataName, $arModel, $arColumns = array(), $arActions = array(), $oSort = null, $oPages = null, $arPagerOptions = array(), $sLinkView = 'update', $bEncode = true )
00520     {
00521         //  Build option array for createEx
00522         return self::createEx( $arModel, 
00523             array(
00524                 'modelName'     => PS::o( $arPagerOptions, 'modelName', null, true ),
00525                 'accordion'     => PS::o( $arPagerOptions, 'accordion', false, true ),
00526                 'gridHeader'    => PS::o( $arPagerOptions, 'gridHeader', null, true ),
00527                 'divComment'    => PS::o( $arPagerOptions, 'divComment', array(), true ),
00528                 'pk'            => PS::o( $arPagerOptions, 'pk', null, true ),
00529                 'pages'         => $oPages,
00530                 'sort'          => $oSort,
00531                 'actions'       => $arActions,
00532                 'columns'       => $arColumns,
00533                 'dataItemName'  => $sDataName,
00534                 'linkView'      => $sLinkView,
00535                 'encode'        => $bEncode,
00536                 'pagerOptions'  => $arPagerOptions,
00537             )
00538         );
00539     }
